parameters.SourceStore_Directory: @{concat('/', formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcNow(), 'India Standard Time'), 'yyyy'), '/', formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcNow(), 'India Standard Time'), 'MM'), '/', formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcNow(), 'India Standard Time'), 'dd'), '/')}
parameters.DestinationStore_Directory: @{concat('/', formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcNow(), 'India Standard Time'), 'yyyy'), '/', formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcNow(), 'India Standard Time'), 'MM'), '/', formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcNow(), 'India Standard Time'), 'dd'), '/')}
